General

The software, documentation and any code or information accompanying this
License whether on disk, in read-only memory, on any other media or in any other
form, which will assist you, and the entity you represent (“Customer”), with using
Gremlin’s software-as-a-service offering (collectively the “Software”, and which may
be referred to in the Main Agreement as “Agent(s)”, “Service”, “Software” or some
other similar defined term) are provided to Customer by Gremlin, Inc. (“Gremlin”) for
use only under the terms of this License and the Main Agreement; Gremlin reserves
all rights not expressly granted to Customer under such terms. Use of the Software is
governed by this License and the Enterprise Terms of Service (https://www.gremlin.com/license) or the other,
definitive agreement executed between Customer and Gremlin for the provision of
Gremlin’s software-as-a-service offering to Customer (“Main Agreement”). The rights
granted herein are limited to Gremlin’s intellectual property rights in the Software
and do not include any other patents or intellectual property rights. As may be
further described in the Main Agreement, Gremlin and/or Gremlin’s licensor(s) retain
all right, title, and interest in and to the Software.

Permitted License Uses and Restrictions.

Except as and only to the extent expressly permitted in this License, the Main
Agreement, or by applicable
law, Customer may not copy, decompile, reverse engineer, disassemble, attempt to
derive the source code of, modify, or create derivative works of the Software or any
part thereof; any attempt to do so is a violation of the rights of Gremlin and its
licensors. If Customer breaches this restriction, Customer may be subject to
prosecution and damages.

THE SOFTWARE IS NOT INTENDED FOR USE IN WHICH THE FAILURE OF THE
SOFTWARE COULD LEAD TO DEATH, PERSONAL INJURY, FINANCIAL DAMAGE, OR
PHYSICAL OR ENVIRONMENTAL DAMAGE.

Transfer

Customer may not rent, lease, lend or sublicense the Software.

Termination

This License is effective until terminated. Your rights under this License will
terminate automatically without notice from Gremlin if you fail to comply with any
term(s) of this License. Upon the termination of this License, you shall cease all use
of the Software and destroy all copies, full or partial, of the Software.
